featured.text: And the healthy and fun snack is ready to serve.
It is predicted that driverless cars will be ready for sale within five years.
Mary: Are you ready to go?

definition.zh_def: 準備好的，隨時可以使用或行動的。
definition.en_def: Prepared for use or action; in a state of readiness.
definition.example: She is ready to start her new job next week.
